Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ GM PET SUPPLIES
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B09NWGW22W

REFLECTIVE STRIPS FOR A SAFER WALK. A harness is a helpful dog accessory in dog training for puppies and guide dogs. The bright reflective strips ensure safe dog walks for both day or night. Go ahead and have a worry-free dog jogging at night!
NO PULL, NO CHOKING FEATURE. Its fully adjustable straps at the neck and chest, allows a custom fit that prevents choking and other injuries for your pet. The no pull harness adjusts and helps you control your dog.
DURABLE EASY-CLIP ON LEASH. This has an easy lift-top handle that allows you to easily put on and off the leash on your pet. Saves time and allows you to have more time for dog walks, dog hikes and dog jogs!
GREAT VALUE AND COMPLETE. You would like to have lightweight, washable and highly dependable dog collars and leashes. This set includes a dog leash, a harness and a dog waste bag dispenser with a carabiner clip, a complete gear for your pet!

FITS YOUR FEET PERFECTLY WITH WEDGE SHAPE – Measured as 17 x 10 x 7 inches, it is large enough to meet most people’s needs. Designed as a wedge shaped foot stool cushion.
ERGONOMIC DESIGN – This foot rest for under desk at work can provide you with comfortable & firm support on for your feet & knees

MULTI-PURPOSE FOR ALL YOUR NEEDS – If you turn the foot stool over and put your feet on it, this can become a rocker to move your feet.You can also put the adjustable foot rest under your leg & back to help provide you with great support

Designed as an adjustable office foot rest, you could add or remove the additional cushion by using the magic tape as needed to get a suitable height.

Non-slip Bottom

Comes with the non-slip bottom. This foot rest pillow can be fixed in place to give you a more relaxing experience.

Smooth Zipper to Easily Remove Cover

Comes with the smooth zipper. The foot rest cushion cover is easy to remove for machine washing.

Soft Fiber Fabric Cover

Made of fiber. This fabric cover foot rest pad is skin-friendly to put your bare feet on, providing you with a comfortable experience.

Ergonomically designed with a wedge-shape, our foot rest pad can fit your foot shape perfectly, so you can enjoy a relaxed work & entertainment environment.

Comes with our magic tape. The foot rest cushion can also be adjusted to 2 heights of 5 inches and 7 inches to provide you with the most comfortable & firm support, suitable for every scenario and most people.

Specifications: 

Color: Black,Black+Grey,Beige,Brown
Material: 3D Bright Silk Fabric
Applicable season: All seasons

Features:
1. Auto Newer seat cover protects your original interior from damage.
2. The car seat covers provide a comfortable driving experience.
3. The 3D bright  fabric provides good ventilation.it is made of high-quality 3D bright silk material, which is completely different from the ordinary material in the market.

2* Front Seat Cover(with backrest)

Ultra-breathable Luxury 3D Bright Silk Cloth：Breathable，Dampproof,Universal Four Seasons,Insulates your body from burning hot seats in the summer and freezing cold seats during winter for a comfortable driving experience in any weather.
Compatible with 90% of the car seats: with the unique bottom elastic split design, the rear seat is very simple and fashionable, greatly enhancing the compatibility of various vehicle seat sizes.
Beautiful appearance: the hemmed design provides better protection and beauty. These car seat covers can match the car seat perfectly, even look like the new original seat. They will protect your original seat from wear and tear
Seat protection and safety: the non slip bottom is made of anti-skid high-quality suede fabric, which is not easy to move. The front seat bottom cover and the rear seat bottom cover retain the position of safety belt lock, and the unique small waist design will not hinder the use of airbag.
Easy to install: installation time is about 15 minutes, no need to lift or remove the back seat, beginners are very easy, just follow the steps of the installation video. It never slips when installed correctly.
